Healthcare is complex. But patient billing doesn't have to be.

Salucro provides technology solutions that make it easy to collect patient payments, while providing patients with the best financial experience throughout the process.

Learn More

Salucro is a healthcare technology company exclusively focused on patient payments.

From online bill pay solutions to provider-facing payment integrations, the Salucro platform brings cohesive payment experiences to healthcare providers, patients, and third-party collection agencies.
